title: B.S. Report - 2015 NBA All-Star Weekend pt. 2
description: Bill sits down with legendary sportscaster Ahmad Rashad; NBA All-Stars Chris Bosh, Kyle Korver, and Al Horford; and Rising Challenge players Victor Oladipo, and Elfrid Payton.
